Description:
Vacant Land - Plans to Build 2 Single Storey Dwellings
This is a unique opportunity to either build your brand new dream home or take advantage of the current permits which have been approved for building 2 side by side single-storey 4 bedroom Metricon Homes.
With a wide street frontage of 20.73m and a depth of 41.76m, this block will suit the construction of a wide range of new homes.
Topped off with a location which has you within close proximity to the heart of Croydon and Mooroolbark, opportunities like this one don't come onto the market very often.

Description:
When only the best will do
Online sale!
Selling via "Click & Bid" contact Ben today on 0425 407 363 and find out how to register your interest.
Big, stylish & Brand new! Situated on a block of ONLY THREE, NBN ready, featuring a huge home office / study space. These smartly designed townhouses offer a relaxed, easy lifestyle, in a popular leafy part of Melbourne's East. Within close proximity to a variety of shopping options, bus transport, lifestyle benefits and schools.
Each townhouse will be infused with attractive yet practical features throughout, including the use of stone bench tops, European appliances and two pack cabinetry in the kitchen, solid hardwood floors, double glazed windows where appropriate, matt black hardware in certain rooms, frameless shower screens, gas ducted heating throughout and split system air conditioning.
Spread out over two levels, the ground floor promises social living and entertaining spaces that flow into the kitchen and out onto the deck and into the private yard. A downstairs toilet and European laundry will be included, as well as the master with ensuite and walk in robe. Reserved for the first floor are an additional three bedrooms (all feature built in robes), the family bathroom and separate powder room. In addition, a double garage, water tank and garden watering system provided.
Experience the journey of living in a brand-new home where nothing is required but your daily enjoyment.

Description:
Magnificent Modern Style
A celebration of modern style, this 2-year young townhouse fulfils your every lifestyle desire with its private enclave placement and sophisticated design aesthetics that bring the dream of easy living to life. Highlighted with sleek floorboards, the homeâs free flowing layout introduces a spacious living room before continuing through to the dining zone and kitchen equipped with stone benches, Westinghouse appliances (including dishwasher) plus a breakfast bench. Glass sliding doors are oriented towards the north, allowing natural light to filter inside and opening onto a good-sized courtyard thatâs ideal for pets and children. Carpet adorns the staircase leading up to a peaceful retreat plus the two robed bedrooms, including a master bedroom with built-in-robe and ensuite effect access through to the family bathroom, complemented by a separate toilet, 2nd downstairs toilet and laundry. Notably appointed with split system heating/air conditioning, water tank, garden shed, under stair storage plus a single garage. Residing within close proximity to Heathmont East Primary, Bayswater Secondary, Tintern Grammar, Heathmont & Bayswater shops & trains, Heathmont Golf Course plus EastLink Freeway.

Description:
A Sensational Setting for Lifestyle Convenience
Immerse yourself in the heart of all the action with this spotless, split-level townhouse in Croydon's vibrant town centre. Situated directly opposite Croydon Park, it's only a minute's stroll to the eateries and shops in Croydon's Main Street, Croydon Train Station and Croydon Central Shopping Centre.
- Cosy & inviting interior with neutral fixtures & fittings to suit any style
- Boasting high ceilings, plush carpet and an open plan design
- Well-equipped kitchen comprises stainless steel appliances and dishwasher
- Adjoining living room with large feature bay window
- Two spacious second floor bedrooms include built-in robes and enjoy their own private balcony
- Serviced by a spotless, central bathroom with shower over bath
- Split system heating & cooling for seasonal comfort
- Secure storage cubicle and single car space
- Picturesque views of Croydon Park
- Additional features include Euro laundry and security door entry

Description:
Family Home with Timeless Appeal!
Strategically positioned on a generous allotment of 1,141 square meters in a premier location, this wonderful brick 4 bedroom plus study home is neatly presented and has nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Features include a generous light filled lounge room with additional bar area which flows through to the dining area, a fully appointed kitchen with modern tile splashbacks, plus a fantastic rumpus room - perfect as a kids retreat or pool room!
Enjoy waking up to the mountain views from the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. The home offers a further three large bedrooms with built in robes, the comfort of gas ducted heating and evaporative air conditioning, updated bathrooms, 5.5kw solar system and plenty of space for the whole family. Complete with a decked area for entertaining with tranquil views out to the leafy setting and pool area, double carport plus double garage/workshop, ample off street parking, and all within a short distance to the convenience of Shops, Cafes, and train station. Call today!
Proudly Marketed By Harcourts Boronia. Photo ID Required At Inspections.

Description:
Stylish Family Living & Entertaining
Located in the tightly held Canterbury Gardens Estate on 804sqm (approx.), this three bedroom beauty is presented over a stylish single level, where indoor and outdoor allure are equally matched. Sized up with a dual living/dining arrangement dressed in hardwood floors, the light-filled interior also includes a high-end granite kitchen with S/S appliances and dedicated wine storage. Sliding glass doors ensure a seamless transition to the extensive wrap-around alfresco, a private oasis encompassing a BBQ area and a secluded outdoor spa. Adding to the appeal, carpeted bedrooms are appointed with built-in robes and ceiling fans and share a superbly updated central bathroom with separate WC. Additional highlights include: ducted heating, a remote double garage, alarm, water tank and shed plus a quiet court location thats ideal for families. Both Bayswater North Primary School and the Dandenong Creek Trail are within walking distance, while bus services and local shopping are nearby.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing Agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available.
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Contemporary Style with Architect Influence
**As per government COVID-19 restrictions, no physical inspections will be conducted until after stage 4 lockdown**
Masterfully designed by renowned architect Hank Romyn, this wonderfully styled residence is more than a family home, its a statement of contemporary style and unique living. Occupying a private 965m2 approx. with ample off street parking, a large double garage and an elevated outdoor deck with spa, the split level interior is a showcase of light, texture and inviting living and bedroom spaces, highlighting a zoned master on the top floor with an ensuite bathroom and a walk in wardrobe. Occupying the front of the home are the other two bedrooms which both provide outdoor access and are comfortably serviced by the main bathroom with sauna. Taking centre stage is the main living room with wood fire and the galley style kitchen with walk in pantry and adjoining laundry and third toilet. Ideally located for optimum convenience, Croydon transport and shops are a short walk or commute away, with Croydon North shops, Chirnside Park and Mooroolbark also close by.

Description:
Low-maintenance living
Due for completion within 90 days. Indulge in the latest townhouse development that offers an outstanding lifestyle which presents ultimate convenience and luxury at its very best. This well-presented 2 bedroom home are naturally light-filled featuring BIR, spacious floor plan, impressive stone bench tops with stainless steel appliances. With so much on offer this is a wonderful opportunity to secure an outstanding property in a highly sought-after location.
Offering unparalleled quality, bringing lifestyle, quality and affordability together to create a superior living experience in a unique, boutique estate. Stamp duty savings and First Home Buyers grant are on offer along with the reassurance of a builder with a long and proven track record for delivering top quality homes time and time again.
All this is situated within an easy walk to buses and parks, local shops, cafes, and immediate access to Churinga Shopping Centre, schools and recreational facilities. With Mount Dandenong & Yarra Valley right on your doorstep, you can explore all it has to offer at your leisure.

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers and Developers!
Nestled in a quiet street with great access to public transport, easy access to Churinga Shopping Centre, and Mooroolbark station, is a great opportunity to secure this perfect first home, investment or development site (STCA).
Boasting an enviable 967m2 approx., zoned DD08, and situated in an area with plenty of precedence for development.
The existing home comprises 3 bedrooms including a master bedroom with full en-suite and WIR, main bathroom, spacious lounge with inviting wood fire place adjacent to a well appointed kitchen/ meals area. Outside is a fantastic entertaining area, perfect for all seasons, and a double carport with attached room ideal for a home office.
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. DONT MISS OUT!
Insights: Kilsyth VIC 3137 was last sold in 1988 and 131 other 3 bedroom house in Kilsyth have recently been sold.

Description:
Highest Price Guaranteed. Call Scott Kim on 9568 8000
Endless Options on a 703sqm Block with a 17m Frontage!
Positioned on a flat 703sqm (17m x 42.6m) within GRZ1 of Maroondah Council, is a solid three bedroom family home ideal for renovators, investors or those looking to build their dream family home or multiple townhouses (STCA).
Just a short stroll to Ringwood East train station, buses, Ringwood East community shopping village, Ringwood Lake and Maroondah hospital with your choice of the finest schools including Tintern Grammar, Eastwood Primary School and within the Ringwood Secondary College catchment.
Contact Scott Kim on (03) 9568 8000 to secure this dream opportunity today!
***Please Note***
TG Newton & Co may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your full contact details. All enquiries must contain your best contact number.

Description:
Superior Executive Townhouse with Family Proportions
Finished to the most impeccable standards, this superior, 4 bedroom executive townhouse is presented perfectly, in near-new condition, to suit quality-driven families and proud home entertainers. Timeless elegance with a refined indoor-outdoor connection ensures that this is a home with a broad and enduring market appeal, in one of Melbournes prime growth corridors, at the foot of the Dandenong Ranges.
Unashamedly revealing a commitment to excellence, the homes kitchen / meals / living is a vast space suited to daily family life and entertaining. Merging CaesarStone benchtops with stainless steel appliances and glass splashbacks, under striking pendant lighting, the kitchen is a proud showpiece whilst a walk-in pantry ensures incredible functionality. Seamless flow to a rear deck is perfect for entertainers.
The master bedroom is conveniently set downstairs with an ensuite and built-in robes, whilst another 2 bedrooms are set upstairs providing a fabulous childrens zone with an open retreat and a family-sized bathroom. Another powder room, downstairs, caters to the 4th bedroom and the living zones.
With attractive polished timber floors underfoot, the home also offers year-round comfort with central heating, cooling and split systems, plus there is a double garage that offers convenient direct access to the main home.
Zoned for Bayswater Secondary College, the home is within walking distance of strip shopping and cafes at Bayswater and plenty of local buses, plus there is a broader shopping experience with cinemas to be found at Boronia Shopping Centre, while Bayswater Railway Station is also just a few minutes away for effortless city commuting.
Insights: 1A Bertram Road, Bayswater VIC 3153 was last sold in 2015 and 34 other 4 bedroom house in Bayswater have recently been sold.

Description:
Indulge in an effortless family lifestyle.
Quietly tucked away in a premium leafy court, beyond the rendered front fence and double gates this well-appointed, four-bedroom residence affords the family an impressive departure from ordinary. Warmed by polished floorboards and dado rails featured throughout, relish the sense of fine family living every day.
The considered layout indulges the occupants with separate and spacious living zones utterly devoted to the family experience. Multiple living areas include a formal L-shaped living and dining, meals area, family domain with open fireplace and rumpus room. Stepping outdoors, the extensive paving and gazebo add to the available entertaining options while the solar-heated, in-ground swimming pool and spa provide endless hours of fun.
The quality craftsmanship in the timber kitchen conveys a timeless feel. Generous storage and solid timber benchtops work together to create a functional work space to impress the accomplished cook, while additional features are; electric oven, stainless steel five-burner gas stove, dishwasher, double pantry, breakfast bar and easy-to-clean slate flooring.
Designed with relaxation in mind, the master features a walk-in robe and renovated luxury ensuite boasting a rain shower, bath, stone-topped vanity, on-trend square-profile tapware and large format floor-to-wall tiles. There are two additional bedrooms zoned away from the master for privacy, in addition to a self-contained bungalow featuring a living area, fourth bedroom and full ensuiteperfectly suitable for teens, guests or perhaps working from home.
The laundry is fitted with ample storage while other appreciable benefits include; light-filled main bathroom comprising a shower over bath, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning, LED lights, double linen cupboard, roller shutter (master), security cameras, security alarm, sheds, in-ground trampoline and double carport. Theres also a studio/gym/workshop area with split system air-conditioningyet another versatile space to utilise as desired.
This property is positioned just a short walk from Bungalook Creek, Gracedale Park with barbeque area and playground, Heathmont East Primary School, Heathmont Bowling Club, as well as being only a brief drive from Heathmont Village and Railway Station, Tinternvale Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Aquinas College, hospitals and EastLink freeway.
Occupying a 966m2 (approx.) block, theres also potential for development (subject to council approval). This beautiful home has been designed to afford an unquestionably comfortable lifestyle.
Insights: 3 Atunga Court, Heathmont VIC 3135 was last sold in 2016 and 38 other 4 bedroom house in Heathmont have recently been sold.

Description:
DREAM BLOCK IN A DREAM LOCATION
Positioned in a beautiful tree-lined street in the heart of Ringwood East, this original weatherboard home is ready for the next chapter of its life. While the dwelling may need some TLC to transform it into a modern and contemporary abode, the location is enviable just steps from the bustling village shops and its array of cafes and restaurants and the train station. The perfect project for builders/developers (STCA) or owner-occupiers looking for a hard to beat locale and all the lifestyle benefits it provides.
The existing character dwelling includes a central gas-heated lounge/dining that connects with a spacious kitchen with gas cooking and wall oven, four bedrooms and a functional bathroom. At the rear is a large sunroom which has leafy views of the garden. The approx. 830m2 block includes side access to a double garage and a huge, elevated back yard with a covered alfresco zone. Additionally, there are ceiling fans, evaporative cooling and air-conditioning to keep you comfortable.
Development opportunities do not come much better positioned or easier accessed than this one and will be equally enticing to developers and young families alike. Rent out the house while you make plans for the rest of the block, renovate or build your dream home (STCA).
The highly regarded locale is in the Eastwood Primary School and Ringwood Secondary College zones, walking distance to Tintern Grammar and a short distance to Eastland, Aquanation and EastLink.

Description:
Striking Street Frontage
Positioned in a quiet no-through road in the absolute heart of Croydon and within walking distance of Main Street.
Inside you will find a large open lounge with polished hardwood floors, fully equiped kitchen with dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and spacious meals area.
The meals area flows onto a large rear deck containing built-in lighting and a generous sized private, low maintenance rear yard.
Upstairs is the designated sleeping quarters with two bedrooms with built in robes, large master with ensuite- effect main bathroom. Other quality features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downstairs laundry and powder room, storage shed plus single garage with remote door and rear access.
This is an exceptional property in an incredibly convenient location, walk to Silcock Reserve, Warrien Reserve, Croydon Primary School, Luther College, Croydon Station and Croydon Central Shopping centre. Call now to book a private inspection.
Insights: 1C Arthur Place, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2018 and 43 other 2 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
Register your interest to book a private appointment as soon as restrictions are eased.
Fully Renovated Family Entertainer for the modern family, this fully renovated entertainer offers relaxed retreat-style living complete with designated study and play spaces plus separate children's and parent's floors.
A freshly paved pathway leads you to the front door, where a Samsung smart lock provides secure entry.
Inside an expansive open plan living and dining domain with wood log fireplace is highlighted by bamboo flooring, crisp paint tones plus a soaring gable ceiling that has clerestory windows with remote blinds. A contemporary kitchen is incorporated within this zone; containing quality stainless steel appliances, metallic glass splashbacks plus a stone-top island breakfast bar. Bi-fold doors and a bi-fold servery window, both with fly screens, supply a seamless transition outside, where a covered/lit alfresco with ceiling fan & gas connection allow you maximise your outdoor entertaining experience, alongside a tranquil in-ground swimming pool and accompanying spa.
Configured for work and play; study and activity areas flank a long corridor, where three robed bedrooms are serviced by a brand new designer bathroom that flaunts floor-to-ceiling tiles, a luxurious freestanding bathtub, walk-in shower, vanity and a separate toilet.
A private parent's suite is located upstairs; boasting a walk-in wardrobe, chic en-suite plus a covered balcony that takes in spectacular Mt Dandenong Ranges views.
Further standout features include a lawn area with storage sheds, gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, ceiling fans, a high power solar system, continuous flow hot water, dual driveways plus a remote enclosed double carport with gated rear vehicle roll-through.
Nestled in a family friendly neighbourhood, it accesses buses, Pinks Reserve, Kilsyth Sports and Basketball Centre on foot. Only minutes from Collins Place and Churinga shops, family restaurants, Kilsyth Centenary Pool plus a great selection of schools.
* Fully renovated family home that is big on entertaining
* Spacious open plan lounge/dining room incorporating a contemporary kitchen
* Covered/lit alfresco with ceiling fan plus an above-ground spa
* In-ground swimming pool with all new equipment and the provision for solar heating
* Four robed bedrooms, study and play spaces plus two new bathrooms
* Secure backyard with storage sheds
* Heating, cooling, dual driveways plus a remote enclosed double carport with gated rear vehicle roll-through
* In a great neighbourhood; close to buses, reserves, recreational facilities, schools and shops
10% deposit, balance in 90/120 days
Fletchers COVID-19 Update
Fletchers remains committed to conducting our services in a safe and responsible manner.
Due to stage 4 restrictions, physical inspections are not currently permitted.
We encourage you to contact the agent and register your interest to book a private appointment as soon as restrictions are eased.
Under the latest measures, any work related to contact settlements or end-of-lease scheduled to occur during this period, may be undertaken. This also includes final inspections.
If you are attending a final inspection, you must wear a face mask and adhere to strict social distancing measures of 1 person per 4 square metres. All visitors must confirm that they are not ill and have not been in contact with someone who has contracted COVID-19 in the last 14 days.
Please note that Fletchers agents have the right to refuse entry to any premises during a final inspection if any visitors are presenting with physical symptoms or are not wearing a face mask.
For more information, please visit: fletchers.net.au/response-to-covid-19

Description:
STREET FRONTAGE ON OWN TITLE
Located in the heart of Bayswater close to schools, parks, shops and public transport, this rare and recently titled, street fronted 416 sqm block of land on own title will sure to be snapped up quickly.
All services such as electricity, gas, water and NBN have already been connected along with drainage and crossovers completed, saving you significant time and dollars.
A section 173 agreement comes with the property to build a single storey, four-bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 car home which will instantly realise great value for either selling when completed, or to enjoy the brand new home and quality floor plan for yourself.
Plans and 173 agreement are available so please contact Scott McAuliffe on 0431 939 321 to get all the plans and paperwork and/or arrange a time to meet and discuss.
This property is eligible for the government $25,000 Home Builder new construction grant if, the:
•building contract is signed before the 31st December 2020 and,
•construction starts within 3 months of signing the new build contract.
Act now!!
Please see below link for further eligibility criteria:
https://treasury.gov.au/sites/default/files/2020-06/Fact_sheet_HomeBuilder_0.pdf
Due to COVID-19 and Victoria's stage 3 lockdown, all inspections must be booked for private inspection only.

Description:
UNIQUE FREESTANDING UNIT
With a focus on easy living, this inviting freestanding brick unit is the perfect match for those wanting privacy, security and comfort with an opportunity to modernise and add their own stamp. Delightful with its blooming roses adding colour to its own street frontage, this homely retreat opens to a generous meals area adjacent to a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher both with light-filled views to the covered alfresco courtyard where you can relax and entertain year-round. Clever use of space also incorporates a separate large living room with timber plantation shutters for cosy downtime. Spaciously proportioned, you will further discover two bedrooms with the master featuring a full ensuite plus walk in robe and an additional family bathroom.
The compact allotment also features a single carport with roller door boasting internal and rear access plus additional off-street parking. Additionally, there is split system air-conditioning for seasonal comfort.
An idyllic first home, downsizer, investment or retiree's nest with its own sense of independence, the property is located minutes from the heart of Croydon and all its wonderful amenities including cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, cinemas, pools and schools. Dont delay. Enquire today.
